txt.en:
'[placeholder], my friend, you have the look of one who is growing ready to leave. I want to thank you for all that you have done for us during one of the Stag-clan's most trying times.

'Galtrev is the largest village in Dunland, and it is not far to the south-east of here in Pren Gwydh. I doubt you will encounter any folk of the Caru-l√ªth if you venture there, but surely you will want to stop there as you make your way through Dunland.

'I will miss you, [placeholder]! You are always welcome in Lhan Tarren.'
'What do you want here, Stranger? Why should the White Hand grant you admittance?\n\n'I'm not sure I like the way you're looking at me, [placeholder].'
'You will find Galtrev if you take the road south-east. Make sure you come back to visit, if you can! You will be missed by all here, [placeholder].'
Galtrev, the largest village of Dunland, is in Pren Gwydh to the south-east of Trum Dreng.
Gain admittance to the village of Galtrev in Pren Gwydh
Galtrev, the main village of Pren Gwydh, can be found by taking the road south-east from Lhan Tarren in Trum Dreng.\n\nYou should go to Galtrev as you make your way through Dunland.
